Authors:
Tiara Sousa Cabral, Bianca Denise Silva, Paulo SÃ©rgio
Marinho, Iuri Goulart Baseia
Title:
Geastrum rusticum (Geastraceae, Basidiomycota), a new
earthstar fungus in the Brazilian Atlantic rainforest
Keywords:
Geastrales, molecular systematics, taxonomy, biodiversity,
neotropics
Abstract:
Geastrum rusticum sp. nov., found on decaying wood in the
Neotropics, is molecular and morphologically studied. Full descriptions
with photos, illustrations and taxonomical remarks of collected
specimens compared with related taxa are given. Morphological and
molecular datasets showed it to be distinct from other Geastrum
species.
